beer.name: Hangin Frank
beer.description: Ale hopped like IPA and drinks like a Pale Ale -- Also know and a strong pale. Unlike its un-identical twin brother, Stellar Ale, this hop monster employs more toasted grains and high alpha hops. Hops are the focus of this ale, but not to be undermined with a hearty malt base. Big hop aroma is followed by the cool refreshment of a toasted sourdough biscuit covered which is then covered with zesty citrus hop marmalade.
